Detailed Description

This class is the root of all the objects created within the shell.

All objects support polymorphic trees through gen_copy and ~ methods and normal containers (in the future) through default (& copy) constructors and ~ methods

Field Documentation

map<string,m3_object *> m3_object::properties [protected]

List of properties associated to the object.

Each property has a name and a value (which is another object).
